summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North and West 35th Street from a point 200 feet west of Evanston Avenue to West Canal Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
